location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Shaikh Sultan bin Saqr of Buraimi, Na’im. L. Shaikh Mohamed bin Rahmah bin Salman of Sumaini, Al Bu Shams. R. Mudhaffar, Wali of Sohar'

mods.abstract: Two black and white photographs with their subjects identified in writing below each one. The first depicts Shaikh Sultan bin Saqr of Buraimi (of the Na’im tribe) standing in front of a wall, while the second shows Shaikh Mohamed bin Rahmah bin Salman of Sumaini (of the Al Bu Shams tribe) and Mudhaffar, the Wali of Sohar.
